subject: docs: add work hours vs after-hours distinction to roadmap
body:
Renamed "Weekend & Holiday Visual Distinction" to "Work Pattern Visual Distinction"

Added time-of-day items:
- Work hours highlighting (8:00-17:00)
- After-hours styling for commits outside work window
- Hour charts integration with work hours band
- Configurable hours setting (default 8-17)

Updated cross-cutting items:
- Heatmap now shows work hours rows + weekend columns
- Commit badges include "After Hours" option
